title: 04/02/2021 - HOUR 2 - Rivera's Plan, John Middlekauff, Ugly KD
itunes:title: 04/02/2021 - HOUR 2 - Rivera's Plan, John Middlekauff, Ugly KD
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--examines Washington Football Team head coach Ron Rivera's master plan for building a winner. Also, John Middlekauff--former NFL Scout and host of the 3 & Out podcast--stops by to discuss team activity and movements prior to the NFL Draft. Plus, Doug touches on Brooklyn Nets power forward Kevin Durant's ugly back-and-forth with comedian Michael Rapaport.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
